title: Question - Speed comparison to llama.cpp
body: Were you running the same model in llama.cpp and bitnet.cpp when making the speed comparisons?
author: jurke-solwr

comments.body: The same model weights value and the output result is the same, however the weights packing methods are different so that different model files are used.
Thanks for clarifying. Your results are very impressive.

satisfaction_conditions: Confirmation that the same model weights were used in both implementations for the speed comparison
Clarification that differences in implementation (e.g., weights packaging) do not affect the validity of the comparison
